title: Wallpaper Typefaces
content:
I am creating a wallpaper that is only type and wanted to ask some gurus of the business are there any particular faces that look amazing for a wallpaper. I'm a hefty sans-serif guy because I love the curves and the simplicity of sans-serif.

I'm using Illustrator if that matters at all.

Thanks in advanced.
author: ejohnson

comments.content:
Wallpaper wallpaper? or Desktop Wallpaper?

penn
